message: The xml:id of the TEI element should be equal to the name of the file, without the file extension. Currently the value of xml:id is "step_CaDCoMC_020218" whilst the file name is "step_CaDCoMC_020218.xml"
TEI/@type should be either "researchScenario" or "researchStep". The current value of TEI/@type is "researchStep"

test: tei:date and tei:persName and tei:affiliation and tei:desc
message: When recording a revision, some precise metadata must be given : the date of the revision, the name of the responsibe and his/her affiliation and a description.

nodeText:
Select resources to be included in the corpus. After
      collecting original musical sources, transcribe them adding critical editorial signs and
      normalizing, where applicable, ancient poetic texts to modern usage. To get directly MEI
      files, use MEISE (MEI Score Editor).
message: In the <desc type="definition>, there should be nothing more than text, <list> and <ref>.

nodeText:
Sélectionner les ressources à inclure dans le corpus.
      Après avoir rassemblé les sources musicales originales, les transcrire en ajoutant les signes
      éditoriaux critiques et en adaptant, le cas échéant, les anciens textes poétiques à la norme
      moderne. Pour obtenir directement des fichiers MEI, utiliser MEISE (MEI Score Editor).
message: In the <desc type="definition>, there should be nothing more than text, <list> and <ref>.
It is possible to add terms to resources, for instance a standard or a technique.

The main sponsor of the SSK is the PARTHENOS project. All scenarios and steps should record this information.
sourceDesc in mandatory in TEI, so if you want to give details on the way the scenario was conceived, it is the appropriate location.
